plist:
EnvironmentVariables
PATH /Users/mrezasalehi/.virtualenvs/base/bin:/Users/mrezasalehi/.autojump/bin:/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/V>
Label email.assistant ProgramArguments
/Users/mrezasalehi/.virtualenvs/base/bin/python /Users/mrezasalehi/Desktop/email-assistant/email_assistant.py
RunAtLoad
StartInterval 1800 StandardOutPath /tmp/email.assistant.stdout StandardErrorPath tmp/email.assistant.stderr UserName mrezasalehi InitGroups
</plist
